messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] examples of abuse from link
messages.msgSnippet: His, hers, ours.  Sometimes single parent with children with various fathers.  And, in some cases mixed races.  Depends on the agency using the expression.
messages.messageBody:
His, hers, ours. Sometimes single parent with children with various
fathers. And, in some cases mixed races. Depends on the agency using the
expression.

Lynda

----------
> From: Shirley A Richardson-McCourt <thediva@...>
> To: Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] examples of abuse from link
> Date: Monday, September 04, 2000 4:39 AM
>
>
> Dawn said:
> > The examples given in the CPS report are of low income mixed families,
who
> > probably send their kids to daycare...so I don't see the connection
with a
> > middle class family who homeschools their kids.
> >
> Shirley says:
>
> Just curious--what is a "mixed" family?
>

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] examples of abuse from link
messages.msgSnippet: ... Shirley says: Just curious--what is a mixed family?
messages.messageBody:
Dawn said:
> The examples given in the CPS report are of low income mixed families, who
> probably send their kids to daycare...so I don't see the connection with a
> middle class family who homeschools their kids.
>
Shirley says:

Just curious--what is a "mixed" family?

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] examples of abuse from link
messages.msgSnippet: Just for clarification, that isn t a CPS report although they have made it a point to make it look real official.  It is a group of folks that have been cited
messages.messageBody:
Just for clarification, that isn't a CPS report although they have made it
a point to make it look real official. It is a group of folks that have
been cited and some other folks who I will contrain myself and not mention
(but paranoia is a factor, as is membership in another organization I will
not mention as is belief in Ezzo) started to b & g about how harsh the laws
are in their opinion.

Lynda
----------
